title: Remake shinnanigans
body: I just got penalized for not being able to connect to the server and they remaked as i loaded in and now im in low priority que which isnt the funnest i dont think that's the fairest deal like i was loading in and it frozed while i was at 100% and then said i couldnt connect so could anyone explain what happened or if i can get this unjustly penalty dealt with please.

replies.body: All leaves are treated equally due to the negative experiences they cause other players.  The best way to recover from this is by resolving whatever is causing you to crash.  It sounds like your network is failing to establish a connection to the server.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get back in the game.  Let me know if you have any questions!@

The thing is, there is still that bug that makes you unable to connect to a game after your client crashes. This always happens to me, no matter which computer i use(I have an old one that i used when my main pc was defect), happens on a friends pc and happens on another friends Mac. The server just does not let you connect to the game until the game has started in that case.
